001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
004import java.nio.file.Path;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.TreeSet;
008
009/** A grabber helps loading, updating, and verifying external assets. */
010public record Grabber(Bach bach, ExternalModuleLocators locators) {
011
012  public Directory newExternalToolLayerDirectory(String name, Asset... assets) {
013    return new Directory(bach.path().externalToolLayers(), name, List.of(assets));
014  }
015
016  public Directory newExternalToolProgramDirectory(String name, Asset... assets) {
017    return new Directory(bach.path().externalToolPrograms(), name, List.of(assets));
018  }
019
020  public void grab(Path directory, Asset asset) {
021    var target = directory.resolve(asset.name());
022    var source = asset.source();
023    var arg = target.toString().replace('\\', '/') + '=' + source;
024    bach.run(ToolCall.of("grab", arg));
025  }
026
027  public void grab(Directory... directories) {
028    for (var directory : directories) {
029      var root = directory.parent().resolve(directory.name());
030      for (var asset : directory.assets()) grab(root, asset);
031    }
032  }
033
034  public void grabExternalModules(String... modules) {
035    grabExternalModules(List.of(modules));
036  }
037
038  public void grabExternalModules(Iterable<String> modules) {
039    var directory = bach.path().externalModules();
040    module_loop:
041    for (var module : modules) {
042      for (var locator : locators) {
043        var location = locator.find(module);
044        if (location.isEmpty()) continue;
045        bach.log(Level.DEBUG, "Located module `%s` via %s".formatted(module, locator.caption()));
046        grab(directory, new Asset(module + ".jar", location.get()));
047        continue module_loop;
048      }
049      throw new RuntimeException("Can not locate module: " + module);
050    }
051  }
052
053  public void grabMissingExternalModules() {
054    var explorer = bach.explorer();
055    var loaded = new TreeSet<String>();
056    var difference = new TreeSet<String>();
057    while (true) {
058      var missing = explorer.listMissingExternalModules();
059      if (missing.isEmpty()) break;
060      bach.log(
061          Level.DEBUG,
062          "Grab %d missing external module%s"
063              .formatted(missing.size(), missing.size() == 1 ? "" : "s"));
064      difference.retainAll(missing);
065      if (!difference.isEmpty()) throw new Error("Still missing?! " + difference);
066      difference.addAll(missing);
067      grabExternalModules(missing.toArray(String[]::new));
068      loaded.addAll(missing);
069    }
070    bach.log(
071        Level.DEBUG, "Grabbed %d module%s".formatted(loaded.size(), loaded.size() == 1 ? "" : "s"));
072  }
073
074  /** Links a local file via its path name to a (remote) resource identifier. */
075  public record Asset(String name, String source) {}
076
077  /** Links an {@link Asset} list to a directory name within a parent directory. */
078  public record Directory(Path parent, String name, List<Asset> assets) {
079    public Directory withAsset(String target, String source) {
080      var assets = new ArrayList<>(assets());
081      assets.add(new Asset(target, source));
082      return new Directory(parent, name, assets);
083    }
084  }
085}
